column5: how do you guys call BPS and check stock and stuff?  last time I called, no one answered... I tried for another 20~30 times and I gave up  need to check stock on something today again, and no one's answering the phone.  Long
I just call the number on the site and i always get through
Oh boy, if that would only happen, I'd need a part time job.

yes the help at BPS store I find is great when your there but after not so good. I sent a e-mail about looking for the info on the guide that was there Sunday because I was interested in purchesing the product he demonstrated but I have had no reply at all. I know the e-mail was read
I hear theres a walmart greeter postion open.

If you want to check stocks at the Vaughan location, call 905 761 4000, hopefully someone will pick up the phone, if you dont want to pay for long D. call, then call 1 800 BASSPRO and ask them to connect you to the Vaughan store, of course, if some one pick up the phone, then you can ckeck stocks and price.
just drive there man...by the time they pick up the phone, you are probably there already...LOL
